steps.title: Combine the dry ingredients together in a large bowl.
steps.content: Combine the dry ingredients together in a large bowl. Slowly pour in the milk and mix well.

steps.title: Add the eggs, vanilla, and vegetable oil.
steps.content: Add the eggs, vanilla, and vegetable oil. Whisk the batter thoroughly until there are no more lumps.

steps.title: Heat a frying pan over medium-high heat.
steps.content: Heat a frying pan over medium-high heat. Coat with a non-stick cooking spray, butter, or vegetable oil to prevent sticking.

steps.title: Spoon the batter onto the pan and cook each side until it is golden brown.
steps.content: Spoon the batter onto the pan and cook each side until it is golden brown. Use a spatula to flip the pancakes and to remove them when they are finished.

steps.title: Serve immediately.
steps.content: Serve immediately. Add fruit, maple syrup, whipped cream, or powdered sugar if desired.
